product_overview: An interactive gamified platform designed to guide users through various data career paths, combining educational content with engaging games that develop both technical and behavioral skills for data professionals.
core_goals: Provide users with a clear and engaging way to explore different data career paths including Data Engineer, Data Scientist, and BI Analyst.
Enable users to choose and progress through specialized career development tracks focusing on Technical Mastery or Soft Skills & Leadership.
Offer diverse interactive games that teach and reinforce data-related skills such as pipeline building, SQL querying, data management, and professional decision-making.
Visualize user progress through an intuitive career map that reflects unlocked levels and achievements.
Educate users via story modals that set the context before games and provide feedback and impact reports after completion.
key_features: Hero Selection screen allowing users to select their desired data career path.
Path Selection screen presenting options between Technical Mastery and Soft Skills & Leadership tracks.
Career Map visualization displaying unlocked levels and progress in a winding career path format.
Pipeline Puzzle Game challenging users to connect data pipeline components correctly to build workflows.
Null Runner Action Game where players collect beneficial signals and avoid noise to hone quick decision skills.
Query Master Word Puzzle Game focused on constructing SQL queries by selecting the correct blocks.
Data Farm Idle Game that simulates planting and harvesting data plots to meet targets.
Server Guardian Tower Defense Game where players protect a database from bugs by deploying defenses strategically.
Behavioral RPG Scenario Game where players navigate professional workplace choices to improve soft skills and leadership.
Story Modal system providing educational mission briefings before games and impact reports after game completion.
user_flow_summary: User lands on Hero Selection screen to choose their career path.
User proceeds to Path Selection to select between Technical or Behavioral development tracks.
User accesses the Career Map to view unlocked levels and available challenges.
User selects individual games (Pipeline Puzzle, Null Runner, Query Master, Data Farm, Server Guardian, Behavioral) based on career path and track.
Before starting a game, the Story Modal presents a mission briefing to provide context.
User plays the selected game, completing puzzles or challenges related to their career development.
Upon game completion, Story Modal displays an impact report summarizing user performance and learning outcomes.
User advances through career map levels unlocking new games and features as they progress.
validation_criteria: All career paths (Data Engineer, Data Scientist, BI Analyst) and their respective selection interface display correctly and function as expected.
Path Selection correctly shows two track options and records user choice accurately.
Career Map accurately reflects unlocked levels corresponding to user progress without errors.
Each mini-game loads successfully, runs without crashes, and provides appropriate game mechanics as designed.
Story Modals display properly before and after games, giving clear mission briefings and impact reports.
User progress is saved and reflected accurately within the Career Map and subsequent game availability.
UI is consistent, responsive, and accessible across supported devices and screen sizes.
APIs for screens and game interactions perform within acceptable response times and handle errors gracefully.
